mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts( id, owner, source, customerId, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, birth, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address )values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{source}, #{customerId}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{email}, #{mphone}, #{job}, #{birth}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_contacts where fullname like '%' #{name} '%'
